hadiths.text: Ali (bin Abi Talib) narrated that The Messenger of Allah said:“Indeed Allah has made unlawful through suckling whatever He made unlawful through lineage.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ يُحَرَّمُ مِنَ الرَّضَاعِ مَا يُحَرَّمُ مِنَ النَّسَبِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been related about: Suckling makes unlawful whatever lineage makes unlawful
